sentences.english: Then why does the white man despise the yellow?
sentences.chinese: 那麼爲什麼白種人會輕視黃種人呢？

sentences.english: The Chinese belong to the yellow race.
More importantly , Yao Ming is a yellow.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，姚明是一個黃種人。

sentences.english: We are of the yellow race and descendants of the Yellow Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 我們是黃種人，是炎黃子孫。

sentences.english: And all at once, you can hear the screaming chinks .
sentences.chinese: 在那片刻，你可以聽見那尖叫的黃種人們。

sentences.english: I wished to prove to him that a yellow man could save his armies.
sentences.chinese: 我要向他證明一個黃種人能夠拯救他的軍隊。
